item.title: Interface Welcome Screen help
item.dc:creator: @thel33test thel33test
item.description:
@thel33test wrote:

yes lol, heres what you need
public static void Welcomescreen(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid) {
Class9 intWelcomescreen = addDTab(96250);
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray240 = new int[26];
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray241 = new int[26];
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray272 = new int[26];
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray240[0] = 96251;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray241[0] = 4;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray272[0] = 16;
//Main sprite
addSprite(96251, 0, 0, “mainframe”);
//Control 96252 (0)
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray240[1] = 96252;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray241[1] = 118;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray272[1] = 265;
//Close button
addCloseButton(96252, “clickhere”, 275, 36, “Close”);
//Control 96253 (1)
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray240[2] = 96253;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray241[2] = 131;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray272[2] = 191;
//Label
addText(96253, “Thank You & Enjoy The Server”, wid, 0, 0xFFFFFF);
//Control 96254 (2)
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray240[3] = 96254;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray241[3] = 120;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray272[3] = 147;
//Label
addText(96254, “-The Guild Book in your inventory”, wid, 0, 0xFFFFFF);
//Control 96255 (3)
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray240[4] = 96255;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray241[4] = 390;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray272[4] = 46;
//Image
addSprite(96255, 0, 0, “STEELBORDER2 0”);
//Control 96256 (4)
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray240[5] = 96256;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray241[5] = 355;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray272[5] = 46;
//Image
addSprite(96256, 0, 0, “STEELBORDER2 0”);
//Control 96257 (5)
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray240[6] = 96257;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray241[6] = 119;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray272[6] = 128;
//Label
addText(96257, “-Read Rules Befor You Start Playing-”, wid, 0, 0xFFFFFF);
//Control 96258 (6)
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray240[7] = 96258;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray241[7] = 119;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray272[7] = 110;
//Label
addText(96258, “-Vote Daily: VoteUniversion.Tk”, wid, 0, 0xFFFFFF);
//Control 96259 (7)
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray240[8] = 96259;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray241[8] = 117;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray272[8] = 93;
//Label
addText(96259, “-Forums: Universion.Tk”, wid, 0, 0xFFFFFF);
//Control 96260 (8)
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray240[9] = 96260;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray241[9] = 117;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray272[9] = 74;
//Label
addText(96260, “-Owner: Riza”, wid, 0, 0xFFFFFF);
//Control 96261 (9)
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray240[10] = 96261;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray241[10] = 115;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray272[10] = 46;
//Image
addSprite(96261, 0, 0, “STEELBORDER2 0”);
//Control 96262 (10)
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray240[11] = 96262;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray241[11] = 80;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray272[11] = 46;
//Image
addSprite(96262, 0, 0, “STEELBORDER2 0”);
//Control 96263 (11)
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray240[12] = 96263;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray241[12] = 149;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray272[12] = 46;
//Image
addSprite(96263, 0, 0, “STEELBORDER2 0”);
//Control 96264 (12)
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray240[13] = 96264;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray241[13] = 218;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray272[13] = 46;
//Image
addSprite(96264, 0, 0, “STEELBORDER2 0”);
//Control 96265 (13)
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray240[14] = 96265;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray241[14] = 184;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray272[14] = 46;
//Image
addSprite(96265, 0, 0, “STEELBORDER2 0”);
//Control 96266 (14)
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray240[15] = 96266;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray241[15] = 252;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray272[15] = 46;
//Image
addSprite(96266, 0, 0, “STEELBORDER2 0”);
//Control 96267 (15)
int Welcomescreen.anIntArray240[16] = 96267;
int Welcomescreen.anIntArray241[16] = 145;
int Welcomescreen.anIntArray272[16] = 25;
//Label
addText(96267, “Welcome To UniversionPk”, wid, 0, 0xFFFFFF);
//Control 96268 (16)
int Welcomescreen.anIntArray240[17] = 96268;
int Welcomescreen.anIntArray241[17] = 320;
int Welcomescreen.anIntArray272[17] = 46;
//Image
addSprite(96268, 0, 0, “STEELBORDER2 0”);
//Control 96269 (14)
int Welcomescreen.anIntArray240[18] = 96269;
int Welcomescreen.anIntArray241[18] = 287;
int Welcomescreen.anIntArray272[18] = 46;
//Image
addSprite(96269, 0, 0, “STEELBORDER2 0”);
//Control 96270 (18)
int Welcomescreen.anIntArray240[19] = 96270;
int Welcomescreen.anIntArray241[19] = 406;
int Welcomescreen.anIntArray272[19] = 59;
//Image
addSprite(96270, 0, 0, “char2”);
//Control 96271 (19)
int Welcomescreen.anIntArray240[20] = 96271;
int Welcomescreen.anIntArray241[20] = 425;
int Welcomescreen.anIntArray272[20] = 46;
//Image
addSprite(96271, 0, 0, “STEELBORDER2 0”);
//Control 96272 (20)
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray240[21] = 96272;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray241[21] = 463;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray272[21] = 46;
//Image
addSprite(96272, 0, 0, “STEELBORDER2 0”);
//Control 96273 (21)
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray240[22] = 96273;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray241[22] = 460;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray272[22] = 46;
//Image
addSprite(96273, 0, 0, “STEELBORDER2 0”);
//Control 96274 (22)
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray240[23] = 96274;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray241[23] = 45;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray272[23] = 46;
//Image
addSprite(96274, 0, 0, “STEELBORDER2 0”);
//Control 96275 (23)
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray240[24] = 96275;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray241[24] = 19;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray272[24] = 59;
//Image
addSprite(96275, 0, 0, “char”);
//Control 96276 (24)
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray240[25] = 96276;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray241[25] = 9;
intWelcomescreen.anIntArray272[25] = 46;
//Image
addSprite(96276, 0, 0, “STEELBORDER2 0”);
//Added 25 controls.
}

item.title: Interface Welcome Screen help
item.dc:creator: @p00n_scape p00n scape
item.description:
@p00n_scape wrote:

ive just made this Welcome Screen

But once i Run My Client it loads just untill “Unpacking Interfaces” then it shows A Black Screen?

207wyyx.jpg768×502

i think something is Wrong with this code cause when i remove it it doesnt Make the Error Screen

is there anything that isnt Right in there? Personne who helps me Rep++
